overview: The transsexual community and fans of TS entertainment know they can look to Evil Angel for love, support and top-notch porn. Longtime Evil director Joey Silvera is a genuine pioneer of quality T-entertainment, and Evil filmmaker Aiden Starr extends the tradition with creative, conscientious trans erotica. Now Evil presents "Trans Figure," a comililation of four incendiary recent scenes that show Joey's and Aiden's diverse approaches.
title: Trans Figure
